verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which came unto \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Cushi|strong="H3570"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hizkiah|strong="H2396"\w*, in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amon|strong="H0526"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

I will \w utterly|strong="H0622"\w* \w consume|strong="H5486"\w* all \add things\add* from off the \w land|strong="H6440"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 1.2 \ft I will…: Heb. By taking away I will make an end\f*\f + \fr 1.2 \ft the land: Heb. the face of the land\f*

I will \w consume|strong="H5486"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*; I will \w consume|strong="H5486"\w* the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and the \w fishes|strong="H1709"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and the \w stumblingblocks|strong="H4384"\w* with the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*; and I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* from \w off|strong="H6440"\w* the \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 1.3 \ft stumblingblocks: or, idols\f*

I will also stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and upon all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H7605"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* from this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \add and\add* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w Chemarims|strong="H3649"\w* with the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*;

And them that \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* upon the \w housetops|strong="H1406"\w*; and them that \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \add and\add* that \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and that \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by \w Malcham|strong="H4428"\w*;\f + \fr 1.5 \ft by the…: or, to the \+nd LORD\+nd*\f*

And them that are turned \w back|strong="H5472"\w* \w from|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and \add those\add* that have not \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, nor \w enquired|strong="H1875"\w* for him.

Hold thy \w peace|strong="H2013"\w* at the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*: for the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* at \w hand|strong="H7138"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, he hath \w bid|strong="H6942"\w* his \w guests|strong="H7121"\w*.  +  r 1.7  t bid: Heb. sanctified, or, prepared *

And it shall come to pass in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, that I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and all such as are \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w apparel|strong="H4403"\w*.\f + \fr 1.8 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*

In the same \w day|strong="H3117"\w* also will I \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* all those that \w leap|strong="H1801"\w* on the \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w*, which \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* their \w masters’|strong="H0113"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* with \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* and \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*.

And it shall come to pass in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add that there shall be\add* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of a \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* from the \w fish|strong="H1709"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and an \w howling|strong="H3215"\w* from the \w second|strong="H4932"\w*, and a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w crashing|strong="H7667"\w* from the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*.

\w Howl|strong="H3213"\w*, ye \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Maktesh|strong="H4389"\w*, for all the \w merchant|strong="H3667"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* are cut \w down|strong="H1820"\w*; all they that \w bear|strong="H5187"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* are cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

And it shall come to pass at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \add that\add* I will \w search|strong="H2664"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* with \w candles|strong="H5216"\w*, and \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that are \w settled|strong="H7087"\w* on their \w lees|strong="H8105"\w*: that \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in their \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will not do \w good|strong="H3190"\w*, neither will he do \w evil|strong="H7489"\w*.\f + \fr 1.12 \ft settled: Heb. curded, or, thickened\f*

Therefore their \w goods|strong="H2428"\w* shall become a \w booty|strong="H4933"\w*, and their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* a \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w*: they shall also \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, but not \w inhabit|strong="H3427"\w* \add them;\add* and they shall \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, but not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* thereof.

The \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, \add it is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, and \w hasteth|strong="H4118"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*, \add even\add* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: the mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w* shall \w cry|strong="H6873"\w* there \w bitterly|strong="H4751"\w*.

That \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*, a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w* and \w distress|strong="H4691"\w*, a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w wasteness|strong="H7722"\w* and \w desolation|strong="H4875"\w*, a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* and \w gloominess|strong="H0653"\w*, a \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w clouds|strong="H6051"\w* and thick \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*,

A \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* and \w alarm|strong="H8643"\w* against the \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and against the \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w towers|strong="H6438"\w*.

And I will bring \w distress|strong="H6887"\w* upon \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, that they shall \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* like blind \w men|strong="H5787"\w*, because they have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall be poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* as \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, and their \w flesh|strong="H3894"\w* as the \w dung|strong="H1561"\w*.

Neither their \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* nor their \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* shall be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* them in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*; but the whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* by the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of his \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*: for he shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* even a \w speedy|strong="H0926"\w* \w riddance|strong="H3617"\w* of all them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
